short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CartInsight for Gmail shows you detailed intelligence for online stores within your Gmail Email interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CartInsight for Gmail shows you detailed intelligence for online stores within your Gmail / Gsuite Email interface. You can instantly see relevant details of the ecommerce store like cart platform used, traffic, address, phone, email, tech / apps being used and more.
